characterDescription: Mario is the main Protagonist for the Mario Series that has well over 50 games. He originally was featured in the Donkey Kong original in 1981. Mario is known for being kind, cheerful, playful, courageous, and headstrong and is also eager and cocky in certain occasions. Mario is always seen as a hero throughout the franchise. Whether it be rescuing a Princess or defeating the evil that gripped the land. Most often seen taking down castles and defeating the menacing Bowser and rescuing Princess Peach countless times. Try out some other games if you love side scrolling platformers or try one of the 3D open world games like Mario Odyssey which is more open world with plenty of challenges.
characterQuotes: Let's-a go!, Mamma-Mia!, Okey-dokey, Here we go!, It's-a me, Mario

characterDescription: Donkey Kong is a series of video games featuring the adventures of a gorilla character called Donkey Kong. Donkey Kong lives peacefully in the jungles of Donkey Kong Island and enjoys doing fun activities. However, he can also be a loose cannon who does as he pleases and is driven by his own impulses, agenda and pride. A flawed hero, DK is fearless, but greedy, helpful, but vengeful, strong, but lazy. Donkey Kong is known for an amazing best-selling video game: Donkey Kong Country and his adventures to remove the Kremlings from his island and return the balance to his once peaceful island. If you like gritty, side scrolling fun, then definitely try and of the Donkey Kong Country games. Amazing music stylings, and some amazing gameplay that brings back an amazing feeling of nostalgia for many gamers.
characterQuotes: Banana slamma!!,Ohh... feels like I got the stuffing knocked out of me... Oh no! I did get the stuffing knocked out of me! Where's my stuffing?!

characterDescription: Link is a Hylian and the hero and protagonist in the seemingly endless Legend of Zelda franchise. Link is a very quiet but courageous and passionate character that does whatever it takes to save Hyrule. In the Legend of Zelda series, Link is always known as the hero of the game and the wielder of the Triforce of Courage . Normally in the games Link is involved in, Hyrule has had a darkness of some sort fall over it. Link usually goes out in search of someone or an item and it ends up getting him tied into the story or losing someone that then, sets him on a quest. Over the course of Link�s stories, he makes plenty of friends, saves tons of people and trains to prepare himself for his final battle with the great evil. The Legend of Zelda franchise has been around for a while and with good reason, they are endless fun with tons of exploration and a story that draws you in every time. Check them out!
characterQuotes: HIYAAHHHHH!, KIYAAAHHH!

characterDescription: Samus is the main protagonist for the Metroid series.  Samus� personality, The Chozo, are mostly an altruistic and kind species. She is kind, compassionate, and has a soft spot for things that are fragile and defenseless. However, Samus is also the toughest bounty hunter in the galaxy.  Samus is mainly known for her role in the Metroid series as a hero. She fights the Metroid(Brain Sucking Jelly Fish Species) to help planets that have been devastated or destroyed by them. Samus is also known for defeating Kraid and Ripley throughout the series. If you love video games that have a futuristic, but gritty side scrolling feel then this is the perfect game series for you. Tons of dark ambient music, amazing creature design, and you get to play as one of the toughest Bounty Hunters IN THE GALAXY!!!!
characterQuotes: Planet Zebes... I called this place home once, in peaceful times, long before evil haunted the caverns below. Now I shall finally tell the tale of my first battle here... My so-called Zero Mission.

characterDescription: Although, like Samus in appearance, this form is a doppelganger of the famed bounty hunter. Dark Samus is the reincarnation of the organism known as Metroid Prime after Samus DNA and Metroid Primes remains were fused together in a pool of Phazon and became the second antagonist to the series. Dark Samus is most known for its appearance in the Metroid Prime game but has been seen in other games. Dark Samus is the main boss in Metroid Prime 2: Echoes and is one of the harder boss fights. Although these games are considered inferior to the original, they are still an amazing addition to the franchise.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Yoshi is better known from his appearances in many of the Mario video games. Yoshi has had his own franchise, but it is not as well followed. Yoshi is always portrayed as being friendly and willing to help others in need. Throughout the Mario series, Yoshi has been portrayed as �a valuable asset� and helps the other characters win levels quicker. Through his own series he is portrayed as a general leader for the other Yoshis and is seen as a hero for helping Mario and Luigi through multiple games. If you love video games with a quirky main character who can eat enemies, produce eggs to throw at enemies, and have a relaxing puzzle type of game, then this series might be perfect for you.
characterQuotes: I know! We should team up! Come on! Hop on my back! , Hooray! Thank you for rescuing me. My name is Yoshi. On my way to rescue my friends, Bowser trapped me in that egg.

characterDescription: Kirby is the titular pink puff and main protagonist of Nintendo's Kirby series of video games. Kirby's body is soft and flexible, allowing him to flatten himself or expand like a balloon. Kirby is considered largely innocent and always has a cheerful demeanor and a go-get-em attitude. In his own universe, Kirby is very popular for his heroic acts, despite his fame, Kirby never lets it go to his head and stays very kind and helpful. Kirby games are normally side scrolling platformers with very bright colors and unique play styles. Easy to follow stories are a plus with most of the game titles, but very memorable gameplay no matter the game.
characterQuotes: You are sneaky, but I will not be distracted by your under-handed tactics., Go meddle in someone else's affairs, Squishy, I've got to get to the Dream Fountain.

characterDescription: Fox McCloud is the leader for the crew in the Star Fox franchise which was created by Nintendo. Although he is an older character, he is always portrayed as a youthful captain and as overall strong minded and responsible in his missions. Fox does not like to follow orders, but gets the missions completed regardless of his reckless abandonment for the regulations. Fox started at the Cornerian Academy after years of training from his father and quickly flew to the top of his class. Having the ability to command the amazing ship called the Arwing, he has undertaken many missions and has left with minimal to no casualties to his fellow crew members. Fox is portrayed as a cocky hero who has a propensity to disregard regulations, but still bring everyone home safely. If you love video games with futuristic space fights, laser guns, and a crew of anthropomorphic characters saving the world from injustice, then this series is for you. All games are mainly flying planet to planet to save individuals or stop nasty plots to conquer and take over Corneria.
characterQuotes: Don't relax, we�re not done yet., Ok guys, destroy all barriers!  (Star Fox 64)

characterDescription: Pikachu is an Electric-type  Pokemon that was introduced in generation one. Pikachu is the most well known and most recognizable pokemon in the Pokemon Universe. Pikachu is usually friendly, however, if threatened or angered, this Pok�mon can be very aggressive. Pikachu is known for being Ash Ketchum�s main pokemon throughout all the pokemon generations from 1996, since the release of pokemon even up until now and so on. Pikachu is a neutral character who only engages when threatened or instructed to by his trainer Ash Ketchum. Throughout the gaming eons starting from Pokemon Emerald up until now his role is neutral. Pikachu works side by side with Ash Ketchum but can be caught in the wild and be made into your own pokemon. Pokemon is definitely worth playing one because it�s fun and two because you gotta catch them all.
characterQuotes: Pika-Pi

characterDescription: Luigi is the notable brother of Mario in the Mario Franchise. Making an appearance in almost every Mario game and starring in three games as the protagonist, over time, he has become a well-known character. Through the early years, Luigi was portrayed as the timid and quiet brother of Mario. Always seemingly in Marios shadow throughout most of the earlier franchise. With the bring about of Luigis mansion, Luigi was thrown into the limelight which revealed more of his personality to the fans. Though Luigi is heroic and kind like his brother, he tends to chicken out of some situations that seem to be too scary or beyond his capabilities. But when he needs to, Luigi is as brave as Mario during events with strong enemies. He seems to be afraid of ghosts and startled quite easily as seen in the Luigi's Mansion games. If you like games that are similar to one of the first side scrolling platformers, with an easy to follow story then these games will be perfect to try. If you are into a darker video game, try Luigis Mansion, or Luigis Mansion 2.
characterQuotes: Mr. Koopa Koot wants my autograph? Me? I guess I'm a little bit of a celebrity after all.", "What? Stay home and take care of the house? Man, that's not exciting at all!

characterDescription: Ness is the silent protagonist in the EarthBound game. He greatly enjoys baseball; not only are most of his weaponry baseball bats, he also can equip several different baseball caps. Ness outwardly seems like he is a friendly and helpful character. Ness is a 13-year-old boy, gifted with special psychic powers, usually compared with the hero of EarthBound Beginnings. Although he is younger, he eventually became the hero of his country, Eagleland. Ness goes around the world to help defeat aliens using his different psychic powers. The games that Ness originally appeared in are unique in the fact that they are side scrolling turn based games that are like the early Final Fantasy series. Easy playable games with a long story and unique mechanics.
characterQuotes: PK Flash!, PK Fire!, PK Thunder!, PK... STARSTORM!!, Okay.

characterDescription: Also known as Douglas Jay Falcon, Captain Falcon is an F-Zero racer and a renowned intergalactic bounty hunter from Port Town. At the age of 36, Captain Falcon had built a reputation as one of the best in the galaxy. Getting bored with bounty hunting, he joined F-Zero to fuel his competitive side, with his own ship, the Blue Flacon. The Captain is always portrayed as Brash and flashy in his appearance and stands tall above the rest. Captain Falcon is considered to be heroic and when not racing is putting away the galaxies worst to claim his rewards. Very virtuous character by many standards, and still loves to competitively race to pass the time. What�s not to like? If you like racing games with very fast paced levels, investigate the original F-Zero series. Although the series has had a few remakes, the originals are by far better in the gameplay mechanics and simple usage inputs.
characterQuotes: Show me your moves!, Come on!, Yes!, Falcon Punch!, Falcon Kick!, Whoops!,  Oh, no�

characterDescription: Jigglypuff is a Normal-type Pokemon that was introduced in generation four. Jigglypuff is a Pokemon from the Pokemon Universe that has very stretchy skin and will inflate itself if it gets angry. In the anime, it has been shown to draw on people's faces after they have fallen asleep. Jigglypuff is known for being a neutral Pokemon in Pokemon Diamond rolling its cute eyes as it sings a soothing lullaby. Pokemon Diamond has fun and exciting legendary pokemon to catch like Dialga and Palkia plus challenging foes like team Galactic.
characterQuotes: JIGGLYPUUUUF!!

characterDescription: Princess Peach Toadstool, is a character in the critically acclaimed Super Mario series, making her debut in Super Mario Bros. for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. She is the princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. Peach is generally known for being sweet, gentle, graceful and well mannered. Peach debuted in the original Super Mario Bros. game when bowser attacks the mushroom kingdom and kidnaps Princess Peach. Peach is normally portrayed as a victim in the Mario series; however, she has played a hero in most of the recently released. She can be a very kind character but is also very powerful when her people are in danger. Peach is not normally a playable character in the original series, but the Mario Party games she is playable. She is also one of the faster characters for the Mario Kart series.
characterQuotes: We have to do what we can with our time to smiles on as many faces as possible!, Oh, Mario! It can't have been easy to make it here. You truly are my hero!

characterDescription: Princess Daisy is the princess of Sarasaland. She debuted in Super Mario Land after she was kidnapped by the evil alien Tatanga after he had taken over the kingdom of Sarasaland and wanted to marry her and make Daisy his queen; however, she was eventually rescued by Mario. Daisy was initially modeled after princess Peach in quality traits; however, the redesigned Daisy is more spunky, sassy, feisty and energetic. She is normally depicted as the tom-boyish sort. Although kind as a character, she does not like to lose. Daisy does not make an appearance until Super Mario Land and sadly is not playable and more of a quest holder. The games that Daisy appear in range from basic side scrolling fun, to sports games, to turn based strategic games. Games with Daisy as a character are usually well made and have an amazing story to follow with.
characterQuotes: When it comes to beauty, there's no denying Daisy is fairest of all! There's no need to battle., Oh, hey! Maybe, maybe I could go with you? (Super Mario Party)

characterDescription: King Bowser Koopa is the primary antagonist of the Mario series and is the archenemy of Mario. Bowser most commonly kidnaps Princess Peach. He is the leader of the Koopa race. Bowser differs greatly from the rest of the Koopas, who appear mainly as bipedal tortoises. His iconic features include a large, spiked shell, horns, razor-sharp teeth, and a shock of red hair. Bowser originally appeared in the original Super Mario Bros. game and was a terrifying sight to behold. Bowser is a villain of pure evil. Cruel and ruthless, Bowser is commonly portrayed as a power-hungry tyrant whose intentions are to rule the Mushroom Kingdom and the entire universe. His crimes range from kidnapping Princess Peach to acts of terrorism, giving him a reputation feared and dreaded by the entire Mushroom World. If you have played any of the original Mario games, then Bowser was definitely part of your childhood. IF you are looking to play him as a character, check out the Mario Party series, or some of the Mario Sports Series. Sadly, he is not playable as the hero in the game. Once a villain, always a villain.
characterQuotes: Pestering me again, are you, Mario? Can't you see that I'm having a merry little time, making mischief with my minions? (Super Mario 64), Gwahahaha! Crashing the wedding, Mario? That's tacky, even for you! (Super Mario Odyssey)

characterDescription: The Ice Climbers are the pair of playable protagonists from the game Ice Climber, released in the pre-Super Mario Bros. era of NES games. When playing one player, the player plays as Popo. When playing two player in Ice Climber, player one plays as Popo, while player two plays as Nana. Bot characters are small in size and both wield wooden mallets which they use to whack enemies or break ice cubes. Both characters wear parka�s; Popo has a blue parka and Nana has a pink parka. In the original game they did not really have any personality to speak of, however, in the smash series the two characters became giddy and energetic. The original game is basically a �Climb as far as you can� game. Score is based on height gained and enemies defeated.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Sheik is a Hylian sudo-hero that is actually Zelda in disguise. Sheik is quiet but pure and you can see that Sheik cares deeply about people. Sheik in the Ocarina of Time game aides Link on his quest to defeat Ganon. Sheik helps Link at various points of the Ocarina of Time by teaching him songs or directing his path. Sheik shows up at the right time whenever help is needed. Sheik even helps Link fight at some points to keep the people of Hyrule safe. You�ll have to check out Ocarina of Time if you want to see more of Sheik!
characterQuotes: I've been waiting for you, Hero of Time...(Ocarina of Time), The flow of time is always cruel... (Ocarina of Time)

characterDescription: Zelda is a Hylian and is the princess of the kingdom of Hyrule and is the helper to the protagonist in the Legend of Zelda franchise. Zelda is a sweet, passionate character who will do anything for her people. She is the the wielder of the Triforce of Wisdom and is usually challenged by Ganon and calls upon Link for help. Zelda is technically the incarnation of the goddess Hylia. Zelda�s story is one of sadness, she cares for her kingdom of Hyrule deeply but a darkness falls upon it. She tries to fend off the darkness on her own and is unable to win or is sometimes trapt or sealed. She then calls upon her hero, Link wielder of the Triforce of Courage for help. Zelda is a very pure character in need of your help, and without you help Ganon may overtake her. Take hold of Link and save her today!
characterQuotes: Here! I want to give you a present! Doesn't this shield suit you perfectly, Link?, Yes, we are humans. We have neither the power of spirits nor demons. But when we combine our strength... No one can defeat us! Right, Link? (Spirit Tracks)

characterDescription: Dr. Mario is the persona Mario takes in the Dr. Mario series. Under this identity, Mario dons a white lab coat, a head mirror, and a stethoscope around his neck. In the games, Dr. Mario works at the Mushroom Kingdom Hospital, using his special Megavitamins to destroy Viruses contained in glass jars. His mannerisms fall very close to the original Mario throughout the initial series. Dr. Mario is slightly slower than the original iteration, but stronger as well. There were only three games made for Dr. Mario, two in the heyday of Nintendo, and one in 2019 that followed closely to the original games. Very fun games, used as a time burner game, with its own version of Tetris in the original.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Pichu Is an Electric-type Pokemon introduced in Generation two. Pichu from the Pokemon Universe are very small, plump, yellow rodent-like Pok�mon. It bears a similar appearance to its evolved form Pikachu. Pichu is a mischievous Pokemon often zapping other Pokemon and even people to surprise itself. In Pokemon Ruby Pichu is known for charging itself with electricity more easily on days with thunderclouds or when the air is very dry.  Pokemon Ruby and Sapphire is definitely worth playing as you battle against the forces of nature in the Hoenn region.
characterQuotes: Pichuuu, Pi Pii

characterDescription: Falco Lombardi is a member of an avian race and ace pilot of the Star Fox team. He is also a good friend and friendly rival to Fox McCloud. Falco has appeared alongside his wingmates in every Star Fox game to date, and usually retains his brash, cool, and collected behavior. Falco is normally just as heroic as Fox, although a better pilot in many aspects. All games are mainly flying planet to planet to save individuals or stop nasty plots to conquer and take over Corneria.
characterQuotes: Slippy can be such a headache., What the heck? Fox, look behind you!  (Star Fox 64)

characterDescription: Marth is the Prince of Altea and is the legendary hero and protagonist in part of the Fire Emblem franchise. He is a kind but stoic character ready to fight for his people against anyone or anything. Marth is the first main character and �lord� in the Fire Emblem series. Marth is the wielder of the legendary Falchion sword and is tasked with striking down the evil Shadow Dragon. Marth draws people to him naturally and effortlessly with his personality and prowess on the battlefield. He must wield the Fire Emblem and the Falchion and face the Shadow Dragon if his people are to survive. The Fire emblem series is a new take on strategy games and will make you fall in love with the characters and cry when you can't save them. Become a Tactician today!
characterQuotes: I am Marth Prince of Altea. It is good to make your acquaintance., Like you I desire peace above all.,  All right that was great training. I can't let Kris protect me all the time. I must become stronger myself too. (Mystery of the Emblem)

characterDescription: Lucina (Minor Spoilers Ahead)- Lucina is the daughter of Prince Chrom of the Halidom of Ylisse and is a hero and protagonist in Fire Emblem Awakening. Lucina is much like her father Chrom and is justice driven and wants to save her friends at all costs. Lucina is a descendant of the legendary hero of old, Marth and wields a Parallel Falchion like Marth and her Father Chrome. Lucina to put it simply is a time traveler. She has gone back to the past from her war torn and utterly lost future. Her first and primary objective is to save her father from the demise he met in her original timeline. Lucina�s game Fire Emblem Awakening, was a whole new look on the Fire Emblem series and has some unique elements to it that to this day have not been recreated. Take up your sword and save the future today!
characterQuotes: I just want a brighter future. I can deal with any hardship now in exchange., I often gaze at the stars. They seem brighter now than they did in the future.(Awakening)

characterDescription: Link is a Hylian and the hero and protagonist in the seemingly endless Legend of Zelda franchise. Link is a very quiet but courageous and passionate character that does whatever it takes to save Hyrule. In the Legend of Zelda series, Link is always known as the hero of the game and the wielder of the Triforce of Courage . Normally in the games Link is involved in, Hyrule has had a darkness of some sort fall over it. Link usually goes out in search of someone or an item and it ends up getting him tied into the story or losing someone that then, sets him on a quest. Over the course of Link�s stories, he makes plenty of friends, saves tons of people and trains to prepare himself for his final battle with the great evil. The Legend of Zelda franchise has been around for a while and with good reason, they are endless fun with tons of exploration and a story that draws you in every time. Check them out!
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Ganondorf also known as �King of Theieves� or the �Demon King�, is a Gerudo and the villain and antagonist in the Legend of Zelda series. Ganondorf is a magical overpowering character who will do what he wants and what he deems as right. Ganon is the wielder of the Triforce of Power and is usually the great evil Link must confront in his story. Ganon�s story varies in the different games, but usually he is released through the breaking of some sort of seal. Once released he uses his unmatchable power to wreak havoc and darkness across all of Hyrule. In most cases the only one who is able to defeat Ganon is the one who is chosen by the Goddess, the hero, that being Link. Ganondorf is a villain like no other, he is timeless and always will be, at some points you may even start thinking he is just downright cool, regardless the great evil must always be defeated. So jump in and take him on!
characterQuotes: Pathetic little fool! Do you realize who you're dealing with? I am Ganondorf! And soon I will rule the world! (Ocarina of Time), Do not think that this ends here... the history of light and shadow will be written in blood!(Twilight Princess)

characterDescription: Mewtwo Is a Psychic-type Legendary Pokemon introduced in Generation one. Mewtwo is a bipedal feline-like Pok�mon from the Pokemon Universe. Its appearance is loosely based on Mew, with a more of a mutated humanoid look in addition to its feline traits.Mewtwo is by far one of the most domineering Pok�mon in the series. Mewtwo holds a large degree of pride in its personality. Mewtwo is known for being the Super Villain character in its game created by recombining Mew's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pok�mon. In Pokemon HeartGold Mewtwo�s battle abilities were raised to the ultimate level, it thinks only of defeating its foes. Pokemon HeartGold and SoulSilver is definitely worth playing introduced in 2009 displays a vast array of fun and exciting Pokemon to catch and places to explore in the Johto region.
characterQuotes: I see now that the Circumstances of one's birth are irrelevant. It is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are., The world pushes us with no mercy and when someone pushes back, the world points and cries evil.

characterDescription: Roy is the heir to the House of Pharae and is another protagonist and hero in the Fire Emblem series. Roy is courageous, proud and will help his friends when they need him. Roy is tossed into war early on in his life and steps up to the challenge. Roy steps up in place of his Father and leads an army to stop the enemy from doing something they might regret. He, while ready to fight, is also always open to a peaceful solution to the conflict he and his army face. A game with Roy in it would be quite a treasure! Not many people have played his game and if you get a chance you definitely should play it!
characterQuotes: You have lost faith in humanity and in yourself. I believe in mankind, and I know that your lunacy must be stopped!, Now is the time of truth! I have the blade of Hartmut, who took pity on you and spared your life!

characterDescription: Chrom is the Prince of the Halidom of Ylisse, and is the hero and is a protagonist in Fire Emblem Awakening. Chrom has a strong sense of justice and will help anyone he finds that is in need. Chrom is a descendant of Marth, the legendary hero-king of old and wielder of his blade the Falchion. In Fire Emblem Awakening, Chrom is the leader of the the Ylissean military and captain of �The Shepherds.� This group was specially created to combat the invasion of Plegia (an enemy kingdom). The two countries are forever at odds with Ylisse being followers of  the Divine Dragon, Naga and Plegia being followers of the Fell Dragon, Grima. Chrom�s game Fire Emblem Awakening, was a whole new look on the Fire Emblem series and has some unique elements to it that to this day have not been recreated. Take up your sword and save Ylisse today!
characterQuotes: You enslave the weak and kill the able. You are the enemy of peace., Enough! I don't require every detail of your twisted philosophy. You're a villain and a murderer plain and simple. And I am the justice you deserve.(Awakening)

characterDescription: Mr. Game & Watch is a composite representation of various generic characters featured in Nintendo's Game & Watch products and video game series created in 1980 by Gunpei Yokoi. Mr. Game and Watch is a man from Superflat World, a completely flat world, having no third-dimension whatsoever. He is also monochrome, and due to being two-dimensional, he can only move in different frames or the Game & Watch games themselves. In the Super Smash Bros. series, he is actually a 3D sprite but so thin he appears to be 2D. Sadly to play any of the games Mr. Game and Watch has been in, you would need to find an original Game & Watch hand held console. Mr. Game and Watch never had his own video game series on console.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Meta Knight, also titled as The Lone Swordsman, in Kirby Star Allies, is a major character in the Kirby series, appearing in most of the games. Due to Meta Knights way of doing his job, most of his actions have hidden intentions of some form. Meta Knight respects the code of chivalry and always offers Kirby a sword whenever they have a fight. Meta Knight has a range of appearances, some being a boss fight form, sometimes he is an ally, and sometimes he is just a background character or a quest giver. Most of the early games had Meta knight as an antagonist to Kirby, but through the years they have became allies. Meta Knight has appeared in most early Kirby games, however he is not playable until Meta Knightmare which was in the game Kirby: Nightmare in Dream Land.
characterQuotes: None shall pass! En garde Kirby! (But I have no sword?!), Oh, you're so right...then Avalanche it is haha! (Kirby's Avalanche) , Come back when you can put up a fight.(Super Smash Bros. series)

characterDescription: Dark Pit, although similar to Pit, is an incomplete clone that was created by the Mirror of Truth. He is considered to be a rival for Pit, having glorious fights throughout the game. Sadly, being the dark part of pit, Dark Pit represents all the repressed feelings and emotions from Pit. Dark Pit is significantly more serious than his jovial counterpart. Dark Pit is also arrogant and cocky and claims to be the original Pit. Although dark Pit is not the best for character traits, he excels at basic common sense, this was proven when he deduces that it would take more than one soul to create an Underworld Monster.
characterQuotes: You're A boss Pandora. But you're not MY boss!, While you were a ring I was less than nothing. Unconscious. Un-myself. We're connected. No you, no me. Two sides of the same coin., I am Dark Pit, servant to no other but myself!

characterDescription: Pit is the hero and protagonist of the Kid Icarus series. He first appeared in Kid Icarus for the NES followed by an appearance in Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters. Pit starts off as an angel stuck in the underworld and his goddess has also been imprisoned. Palutena entrusts a magical bow to Pit so he can defeat Medusa and save Angel Land. Amazing game for the time. The new games add much needed visuals to keep the story flowing in a magical way.
characterQuotes: Do you hear that? Do you hear the people's cheers? They're celebrating the return of the goddess Palutena!, Go home Hades. Just, go home.

characterDescription: Samus is the main protagonist for the Metroid series.  Samus� personality, The Chozo, are mostly an altruistic and kind species. She is kind, compassionate, and has a soft spot for things that are fragile and defenseless. However, Samus is also the toughest bounty hunter in the galaxy.  Samus is mainly known for her role in the Metroid series as a hero. She fights the Metroid(Brain Sucking Jelly Fish Species) to help planets that have been devastated or destroyed by them. Samus is also known for defeating Kraid and Ripley throughout the series. If you love video games that have a futuristic, but gritty side scrolling feel then this is the perfect game series for you. Tons of dark ambient music, amazing creature design, and you get to play as one of the toughest Bounty Hunters IN THE GALAXY!!!!
characterQuotes: Planet Zebes... I called this place home once in peaceful times long before evil haunted the caverns below. Now I shall finally tell the tale of my first battle here... My so-called Zero Mission.
characterSong: Theme of Samus Aran, Space Warrior

characterDescription: Wario- Wario is the main protagonist to the Wario game series. He is technically an anti-hero and the evil and greedy version of his arch-rival Mario. Wario has a natural greed for money but is also very competitive. Wario has the worst temper out of the group (Wario, Waluigi, Mario, Luigi). Most of his games have him portrayed as lazy, ruthless and greedy. Although considered an anti-hero, he has been called a hero when fighting others more villainous than himself.
characterQuotes: Yeah! Take that losers! Hahaha!, Obey Wario, destroy Mario!, Somebody cheated!

characterDescription: Snake also known as �Big Boss� is the original main character chronologically in the long, complicated but wonderful story that is the Metal Gear Franchise. Snake is caring, courageous, and easily one of the most captivating characters ever thought up, he understands war and knows when it�s time to make the right move. In his franchise, Snake is known to be one of the greatest operatives and soldiers to ever live having saved the world repeatedly even if no one noticed; so, in essence he is the savior no one knows. Snake was originally a FOX operative which is a top-secret group with allegiance to the United States during the Cold War. Snake is sent to assassinate his former mentor �The Boss� who has recently defected to the Soviet Union. So alone Snake secretly embarks into enemy territory to take down his former mentor and save his country through any means necessary. The Metal Gear Franchise is widely considered to be one of the most captivating stories ever told in gaming, with some earning the right to be called some of the best games ever made, make sure to give them a try!
characterQuotes: It�s Not About Changing The World. It�s About Doing Our Best To Leave The World The Way It Is., In Our Struggle To Survive The Present We Push The Future Farther Away.

characterDescription: Ike is known as the Radiant hero and leader of the Greil Mercenaries and is the main character, hero and protagonist in a couple of Fire Emblem games. Ike is driven, and avenger and never gives up. Ike is one of the only Fire Emblem main characters not of Royal blood of some sort. After Ike became leader of the Greil Mercenaries he was employed to defend Crimea�s Princess Elincia during their fight with another country. During this time he gains the respect of many warriors both ally and enemy alike. He strives to become an unmatchable swordsman in order to protect those around him and avenge someone dear that he has lost. The games that Ike is in are some of the most loved games in the series and you would be doing yourself a disservice to miss out on these if you love strategy and a good story. Take up your mercenaries and make a name for yourself today!
characterQuotes: Then we will fight�and we will save our people. Make your peace with whatever the gods worship. Your end is near., I don't need to hear anything else then. I'm going to make your death as painful as I know how.

characterDescription: Ash Ketchum is the main Pokemon Trainer in the pokemon universe. Ash Ketchum is the main protagonist of the Pok�mon universe who has always dreamed of becoming a Pok�mon Master.   He is the first human character to be introduced into the Pokemon Universe often being portrayed as being adventurous and charismatic is nature. Ash is known for being a Hero in his respected Universe of Pokemon very determined to be a good Pok�mon trainer as seen in every series/game. He shows a lot of sympathy towards Pok�mon, usually helping and befriending Pok�mon he meets on his long journey. Pokemon is an amazing game and trademark that has evolved throughout the ages will always be worth playing with more and new exciting pokemon throughout every generation. �Gotta Catch them all�.
characterQuotes: I choose you (insert pokemon name).

gameSystem: SNES, Game Boy Color, Game Boy Advance
characterDescription: Diddy Kong is one those characters that just lightens the whole mood throughout the Donkey Kon Series. Often seen as a very small chimp, he has a few unique attributes that make him worth while to use in the series. Most games portray this little guy as jovial and full of energy. Able to run at full spring for a long time, climb massive objects, and of course ride Stampy the Rhino. He has a few noticeable characteristics about him, mainly the bright red hat and red t-shirt with a star across the front. Only issue with Diddy Kong in the original series as his speed, he was very hard to control on the SNES controller. All new releases have a vibrant feel and are easier to enjoy on modern consoles.
characterQuotes: You're bluffing lizard face., You lazy ape you are getting too old for this!

characterDescription: Lucas is the main protagonist for Mother 3. He usually uses sticks or baseball bats for his weaponry arsenal, similar to Ness in that aspect.  He is considered to be one of the more nervous characters in the game and was labeled a �crybaby� after his twin, Claus, disappeared. During this whole situation the islands him and his family live on is invaded by the PigMask Army. The game follows Lucas and his family as they fight back to get their home back from the PigMask Army. An amazing game with trials and tribulations galore. If you love story-based craziness, this game is perfect.
characterQuotes: Maybe I should've gone with Claus...(Mother 3)

characterDescription: Sonic is the quirky yet fast hero protagonist of the Sonic universe. Sonic is an anthropomorphic hedgehog born with the ability to run faster than the speed of sound. Just like a real hedgehog, Sonic can roll up and rapid spin to attack enemies or do quick bursts or speed to deal damage. During his many adventures, Sonic has traveled from the ends of the world to the far reaches of space and time, facing countless trials that have tested him to the fullest, earning him many titles, allies and enemies like Dr. Eggman who is his arch-nemesis. Sonic is easy going in demeanor, and a very strong sense of justice. Although cocky, sonic believes in the freedom of adventure, and will use his abilities to protect the innocent from forces of evil.
characterQuotes: No copy-write law in the universe is gonna stop me!(Sonic Colors), Talk about low budget flights! No food or movies I'm outta here! I like running better!(Sonic Adventure 2), You're too sloooooow!

characterDescription: King DeDeDe is kirby�s arch-rival in the long running Kirby series of games. King DeDeDe is the self-proclaimed and greed king of Dream Land which is located on the tiny Planet Popstar.  Funnily enough, all orders given by King DeDeDe are ignored by almost all residents on Planet popstar. Although he is deemed an arch-rival for Kirby, most of the altercations happened due to him being possessed by other evil doers, and subsequentially blamed. King DeDeDe is also known to be a prankster of sorts. On many occasions he has done minor inconveniences through out the town to get a little chuckle out of other people�s misfortunes. Being as he is mainly a rival of Kirby, he is not playable in most games, but you can see him in most Kirby games.
characterQuotes: I need a monster to clobber that there Kirby!(Kirby: Right Back at Ya!)

characterDescription: Olimar is the main hero and protagonist of the Pikmin series. He was the first Hocotate Freight employee to discover the Planet Of Pikmin and the Pikmin species. Although Olimar looks to be somewhat younger, he has a wife, son, daughter, and a pet. He gets from place to place with his delivery vehicle the SS Dolphin. Olimar is depicted as an emotionless man who just so happens to find the Pikmin planet on vacation�likely story. The whole series is a fun puzzle solving, open world game. Try and rebuild his spaceship and get back home to Hocotate.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterReleaseDate: Japan: September 28, 2006/NA: April 22, 2007/AU: June 21, 2007/EU: July 27, 2007/KOR: February 14, 2008
characterDescription: Lucario is a Fighting/Steel-type Pokemon that was introduced in generation four. Lucario is a Pokemon from the pokemon Universe. Lucario is known for having the ability to use aura to communicate or sense its surrounding environment. Lucario is a bipedal dog/wolf/jackal-like Pok�mon, with a few kangaroo and/or raccoon-like characteristics as well. Lucario is a quiet and well-focused pokemon if provoked can be extremely aggressive. Lucario is a Savior Pok�mon known for his savior role in Pok�mon: Lucario and the Mystery of Mew where Lucario sacrifices all his aura to save Ash Ketchum and his friends. Throughout the gaming eons starting from Pok�mon Platinum where Lucario is known for being one of Pokemon Champion�s Cynthia�s Pok�mon. After Generation four Lucario is rarely seen and only appears a couple times in Pokemon Black/White in Generation five and once in Generation 7 helping Ash. Pokemon Platinum is definitely worth trying out with many cool and amazing pokemon to catch plus awesome places to go in the Sinnoh region.
characterQuotes: NA

characterDescription: The main focus for the R.O.B character was to play as a second player for the NES games Stack-Up and Gyromite. He was meant to change the gaming world forever, however, the accessory that was R.O.B was quickly discontinued just a few years after production. Sadly he was never in any videogames except for Gyromite and Stack-Up.
characterQuotes: NA

characterDescription: Link is a Hylian and the hero and protagonist in the seemingly endless Legend of Zelda franchise. Link is a very quiet but courageous and passionate character that does whatever it takes to save Hyrule. In the Legend of Zelda series, Link is always known as the hero of the game and the wielder of the Triforce of Courage . Normally in the games Link is involved in, Hyrule has had a darkness of some sort fall over it. Link usually goes out in search of someone or an item and it ends up getting him tied into the story or losing someone that then, sets him on a quest. Over the course of Link�s stories, he makes plenty of friends, saves tons of people and trains to prepare himself for his final battle with the great evil. The Legend of Zelda franchise has been around for a while and with good reason, they are endless fun with tons of exploration and a story that draws you in every time. Check them out!
characterQuotes: NA

characterDescription: Wolf O�Donnell is a recurring antagonist and anti-hero from the Star Fox franchise. He is the leader of Star Fox's rival mercenary squadron Star Wolf, as well as Fox McCloud's bitter arch-rival. Wolf is a merciless, brutal and cunning pilot who refuses to accept any form of authority, but still has the ability to gain loyalty from others. He does not do anything out of the goodness of his heart, if it does not benefit him in some shape or form, then it will not be done. He has a short fuse and does not trust easily. This guy is one of the more ruthless characters in the series and really gives you a run for the money throughout the Star Fox 64 series.
characterQuotes: I'm owed an apology, and I WILL have it! (Star Fox Assault), When I'm finished with you I'm gonna have a foxtail for my spaceship!(Star Fox Assault),  You're in my sights! You're going down! (Star Fox 64)

characterDescription: The Villager is one of the many Villagers in the Animal crossing universe. Each Villager has their own unique hobbies and traits they go by. Villager is the player character in the animal crossing series. He/She is the only human in the series. There are eight different personalities for Villager; cranky, lazy, jock, and smug for the male character, and snooty, peppy, normal, and uchi for the female character.  Being as most of the Villagers in the series are anthropomorphic in nature they are capable of acting different perceived emotion, such as crying, laughing, scared ext. There are a few games related to the Animal Crossing series, and each one is addictive and fun to play.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Starting as Rock Man in the Japanese version of the game, Mega Man is the main protagonist and hero of the Mega Man universe. This is one of the series that has so many iterations and splits that it is hard to keep them organized. The main antagonist throughout the series is Dr. Wily. One of the few platformers that seems to get a bit better with each iteration.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: The Wii Fit Trainer is only in one game. Highly doubt it should be considered a video game since you have to work out to play it. She premiered in the Wii Fit �game� that come out when the Wii was at its pinnacle. You had to follow along with movements the Trainer did, such as yoga, squats, push ups ext. Not the best game, but far from the worst. If you like burning calories while hearing the Wii theme in the background, then this game is perfect.
characterQuotes: Hey your muscles won't train themselves you know!(Wii Fit), PRAISE THE SUN!"(Super Smash Bros.)

characterDescription: Rosalina made her debut in the hit game Super Mario Galaxy. Rosalina is a sorceress with great power whose sole purpose is to guard over the universe, the Mushroom World, and her Lumas. No big deal right?  Rosalina has made protecting the universe her main priority in life and she works very diligently to keep it going and make sure everything is safe. She is a loving and caring individual and because of this, her Lumas try their best to keep her safe. If flying around the galaxy and collecting Luma stars while platforming sounds interesting, check out either Super Mario Galaxy games. Both will have you reeling from the beauty of space.
characterQuotes: I've been watching you from here. This place is called the gateway to the starry sky...(Super Mario Galaxy), I looked forward to visiting this planet with the Lumas every one hundred years...(Super Mario Galaxy).

characterDescription: Little Mac is the �hero� and main protagonist of the Punch-Out!! Series. Little Mac was one of the true underdog stories. Being belittled over his height and declined from every major gym to hone his skills, Little Mac found the help of a former pro Doc Lewis. After training long and hard, Little Mac made it to the WVBA (World Video Boxing Association) and defeated who got increasingly stronger and bigger compared to his 4�8� stature. One game with plenty of strategy and pattern following for hit avoiding and knockout punch timing. If you like boxing games and some fast-paced fighting, this game will definitely not disappoint.
characterQuotes: His defense is too tough, doc! (Pungh-Out!!)

characterDescription: Greninja is a Water/Dark-type Pok�mon from the Pok�mon Universe. Who is known for having the body style of a frog. In this form, it now resembles Toxicroak and has gained the appearance of a ninja. Greninja is known for moving with fierce speed and grace of a ninja. It uses swift movements to confuse its enemies while it slices them up with throwing stars made of compressed water. Known for being a Neutral Pok�mon Greninja has an alternate form known as Ash-Greninja form which can transform to this form via Bond Phenomenon and its power rivals the power from the Mega Evolved Pok�mon. Pok�mon X and Y will amaze you at the different Pok�mon and places to explore with more content and graphics being that it was released in 2013.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: The Mii fighters have only been available in the in the Super Smash Universe. Sadly the usage of the characters was limited to the Wii when it originally released and the Wii-U for newer titles. Most of the time fighting with them was impossible and you could mainly use them as placeholders, or in Mario Kart Racing.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Palutena, also known as Lady Palutena is the Goddess from the Kid Icarus Series and one of the main protagonists. She is the ruler of Angel Land and the benevolent Goddess of Light. Before the strife in the first Kid Icarus game, she shared sovereignty with Medusa. Palutena used her power to help crops grow on earth, but Medusa undid Palutenas work to spite her, in turn Palutena banished Medusa to the Underworld and turned her into a hideous Monster. She definitely is a benevolent goddess, one minute making crops grow, next turning your other favorite person into a monster. She was the main aid Pit got from escaping Medusa in the first game by giving him the last of her power, and the hope that he would free her and Angel Land from medusas clutches.
characterQuotes: And as the goddess of light, it's my duty to protect humanity from her. (Kid Icarus)

characterDescription: Pac-Man is the main protagonist to the Pac-Man series, and is husband to Ms. Pac-Man, and father to Jr. Pac-man. This character was originally just played in an arcade on an arcade cabinet. It was not until later where the creator decided to branch out into story gaming and other things such as TV Shows and things of that nature. One of the few games that stayed strong through the years with quite the following. Even the new games are very similar to the original and have only been slightly altered and changed.
characterQuotes: WAKA WAKA WAKA

characterDescription: Robin is the playable character and a protagonist of Fire Emblem: Awakening. Robin is kind and willing to help his friends against any enemy no matter who they might be. Robin is a brilliant tactician and powerful sorcerer and sword user. Robin doesn�t remember anything about his/her past and is found by Chrom. After some events Robin becomes the tactician of the Shepherds and starts to build a name for knowing exactly what to do when. For the rest of the story Robin becomes deep friends with Chrom and the Shepherds on their quest to save the Halidom of Ylisse. You can play as Robin in  Fire Emblem Awakening, which was a whole new look on the Fire Emblem series and has some unique elements to it that to this day have not been recreated. Take up your sword and guide the Shepherds today.
characterQuotes: I'll never understand minions like you and Excellus. No lives of your own... Living only to serve the beck and call of your masters. Pathetic.,  ...Not your god�not today.(Awakening)

characterDescription: Shulk is the main protagonist to the Xenoblade chronicles series. Shulk is a Homs who lives in Colony 9. Shulk is determined, organized, strong-hearted and kind. Despite losing his parents at a young age, he still had people around who cared for a nurtured him. He is a character who gets along with almost everyone he fights next to. He carries a large sword called the Monado. This sword is very special as it lets the user see visions of the future and gives other powers. Sadly, he is the only playable character in the series, but oh man what a series it is. Beautiful scenery throughout, a lengthy story, and fight scenes that will keep you in awe.
characterQuotes: I don't know. It comes from the bottom of my heart. It shows me my enemy. It reveals the future I must change! , Today we use our power to fell a god and then SEIZE OUR DESTINY!

characterDescription: Bowser Jr. is considered to be the second most antagonist in the Mario series and is the only son of Bowser and the heir to the Koopa Fire Kingdom. Bowser Jr. is normally portrayed as a somewhat whimsical nuisance for most of the Mario team. He is pure evil just like his father but acts like a child and is hyperactive. His overconfidence and inexperience are usually the key to his downfall. Given time, Bowser Jr. will definitely be taking over the family business. If you like Mario games, you can normally catch him as a boss fight. You can also go up against him in Super Mario Sunshine.
characterQuotes: I won't let you take Mama Peach away!! (Super Mario Sunshine), Wahahaha! You made it! But I won't even need my dad's help to take care of you!,  Some day...when I'm bigger... I wanna fight that Mario again!

characterDescription: Duck Hunt dog is from the original Nintendo game Duck Hunt. The dog and the duck were not playable characters, rather, the dog would fetch the duck after it had been shot.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Ryu is the main protagonist in the Street Fighter series. He is very skilled in martial arts and is very focused on his training and techniques. Ryu was aiming to be the strongest that he could become. Although a big muscular brute of a man, he is very silent, humbled, and respectful. This is the opposite of his childhood friend, Ken. Ryu is looking for the perfect fight to hone his skills and become stronger than he was before. Each fight brings him closer to his goal. With his will to become so string he awoken the Satsui no Hado which Ryu must suppress from killing him. A burning drive to better himself, ended up hindering him more than helping. The entire series of games are amazing to play. Arcade style beat-em-ups and crazy fight scenes will keep you coming back to play more.
characterQuotes: What strength!! But don't forget there are many guys like you all over the world. (Street Fighter), You did quite well, but you need more training to defeat me!(Street Fighter II)

characterDescription: Ken is one of the protagonists from the Street Fighter series. Kens goal was to test his powers against many foes to become stronger. Ken is the rational one of the two. He does not want to jeopardize his own life for sake of getting stronger, he just wishes to push himself within safe confines to better himself. However, Ken is unpredictable with his emotions. Changing fighting styles mid-way through fighting to catch the opponent off guard. Between the two characters, ken is by far more aggressive and has a very pompous ego that leads to fights he could have otherwise avoided.
characterQuotes: Attack me if you dare, I will crush you!!(Street Fighter II), True strength is something money and credit cards cannot buy! (Street Fighter Alpha 3), If that's all you got, it must be embarrassing for you.

characterDescription: Cloud Strife is the main protagonist to the Final Fantasy VII game. Cloud unknowingly holds a fake persona of a cocky and headstrong SOLDIER 1st Class. Cloud simultaneously denies his true self, yet longs for an identity. Blocking the memories of the events of the Nibelheim Incident, he suffers a mental breakdown when he learns the truth. Cloud carries a huge buster blade Sword which is one of the most powerful weapons at his disposal. Cloud is a loyal to those who he cares about, as well as those who care for him. One of the very few characters that suffers from motion sickness. Turn based fighting mechanics and enjoyable story, although somewhat convoluted. An enjoyable game. Check out some others in the series for even more crazy weaponry, and interesting back stories.
characterQuotes: If only I were SOLDIER...(Final Fantasy VII)

characterDescription: Corrin is half-human, half-dragon royalty and the protagonist of the Fire Emblem Fates games in the Fire Emblem franchise. Corrin is willing to help those in need and knows what should be done. Corrin�s story is a unique one in the Fire Emblem series. In this character�s story you can choose two completely different paths which pin you against the other path you did not choose. In Corrin�s game you choose your family of birth, or the one that has raised you since you were little. During either playthrough Corrin possesses the power of the �Dragon Vein� able to alter the terrain around them. The Fates games are truly a unique type of game that gives you two completely different playthroughs in punishing strategy style of game. Try them both out, they are worth it!
characterQuotes: Sure. Just keep talking. It's what you do best. I'm through talking., You said you would not rest until you killed me�made me pay for my sins.(Fates)

characterDescription: Bayonetta is the main character for the Bayonetta series and is an Umbra Witch. She is considered to be the black sheep of the Umbra Witches due to her toxic methods and family ties which put her with both Umbran descent and Lumen descent which breaks both clans sacred beliefs. She utilizes the Left Eye of Darkness which allows her the talent of Bullet Arts. The ability to combine both melee fighting styles with bullets. With Bayonetta being locked up for 500 years, she has now become callous and is no longer her boisterous and outgoing self. Dealing with amnesia after awakening 500 years in the future would definitely make someone upset, so its understandable. The storyline for the game does go a bit deep, sadly the game is over quite quickly. If you like shooting games and magic, this is the perfect combo.
characterQuotes: I'm sorry. I forgot to mention one of the reasons I hunt your kind. You're much too ugly not to put out of your misery.(Bayonetta), Don't fuck with a witch!(Bayonetta)

characterDescription: Inkling is the face of Splatoon. They are a race of evolved squid children that battle with paint over new territory. Inkling is small, quick, and nimble, using a paint gun and roller to cover everyone in ink. Inkling is about to make a mess of the battlefield. So get down and dirty and take them on!
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Ridley is a very high-ranking space pirate and the arch nemesis of Samus Aran. Ridley is one of the few normally occurring characters throughout the franchise. Ridley is sadistic and bloodthirsty and will do anything to get what he wants. Death, torture, and destruction are his weapons and he has mastered all of them. Ripley is only matched by his resilience. No matter how many times he is defeated by Samus, he always seems to make a comeback in the next game and is stronger than ever. Resembling a skeletal dragon with glowing eyes, the true name of Ridley's species is unknown. Despite his bestial appearance, Ridley is known to be highly intelligent and even shown to be capable of speech. Brutally aggressive during boss fights, he will definitely keep you on your toes.
characterQuotes: SAMUS! Such a miserable and helpless little girl! Your existence is like a bad dream! I WILL ERASE YOU FROM THIS AND EVERY WORLD!, ...maybe I even ate your "mama" so that my cells can live hm? Is she here? AT LEAST PAY YOUR RESPECTS!

gameSystem: Famicom Disk System, NES, Famicom, Arcade Cabinet
characterDescription: Simon Belmont is one of the protagonists in the Castlevania series. He is a member of the Belmont clan, who has protected the world from Dracula whenever he returns. He is very dutiful. It is his responsibility to protect the world from Dracula and he gladly does it. Like all Belmont�s, he wields a vampire killing whip, which is the only thing capable of stopping Dracula. �He who wields the whip is not easily defeated.� Simon is ready to take on the world, are you ready to take him on?
characterQuotes: In my time... you are only a legend. I must defeat you to become a true Belmont.

gameSystem: Famicom Disk System, NES, Famicom, Arcade Cabinet
characterDescription: Richter Belmont is a descendant of Simon Belmont. He is the protagonist of Castlevania: Rondo of blood and is a supporting character in many other Castlevania games. Like Simon, he wields the vampire killing whip. He has a strong sense of justice and an indomitable will. Each generation of Belmont�s is strong than the last, and Richter proves that by being one of the toughest in the family. So crack that whip and take him on!
characterQuotes: Die, monster! You don't belong in this world!(Castlevania: Symphony of the Night), Dracula. Die now and leave this world! You'll never belong here!(Castlevania: Symphony of the Night)

gameSystem: SNES, Game Boy Color, Game Boy Advance
characterDescription: King K. Rool is the king of the Kremlings in the Donkey Kong Universe. King K. Rool is known for is known for repeatedly trying to steal Kongs� Banana Hoard for some unknown reasons. The main reason behind this was a theory to starve the Kong�s out of the island and gain control to store his plunders. As the name says, he is cruel in his intentions and often misleads and degrades his minions. King K. Rool is known for his battling techniques which are mostly dirty and deceiving. Devastatingly heavy hitter on the battlefield and is not afraid to use guns, canons, swords, ext. to fight his opponents. If you like to play dirty on the battlefield and use some crazy weaponry, then K. Rool is a fun character to use.
characterQuotes: Right, I've had enough of this. It's time for me to get going. So you Kongs better get off of my ship or else!(Donkey Kong Country), Now let me see what do I want? To be ruler of all of Kongo Bongo Island? That sounds good�

characterDescription: Isabelle is a supporting character and the player�s assistant in Animal Crossing: Mew Leaf. She appears as an assist trophy and gives food to the one who summoned her. She is very clumsy, absentminded, and avoids conflict. But don�t let her adorableness fool you. She�s ready to brawl!
characterQuotes: Good morning, Mayor!(Animal Crossing: New Leaf), What?! Sorry but my ears are just too fluffy and muffly I guess. Please tell me once more.(Animal Crossing: New Leaf)

characterDescription: Incineroar is a fire/dark-type Pok�mon from the Pok�mon Universe. Incineroar is known for being muscular, bipedal feline Pok�mon resembling an anthropomorphic tiger in appearance. Incineroar is known for being a violent and aggressive Pok�mon known for its brutal prowess in battle. It is known to be indifferent and arrogant, even refusing to battle weak or injured foes. Incineroar is known for being a Chaos Neutral Pok�mon in his respected Universe who will only fight if anyone or anything comes in its way as seen in Pok�mon Sun and Moon. Pokemon Sun and moon being one of the latest released Pok�mon games from 2016 displays a vast array of new and updated content. Plus cool and exciting Pok�mon to catch and fight.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Piranha Plant is a recurring enemy within the Mario universe as is basically a very large Venus Fly Trap with white lips and gigantic teeth. Throughout the series the character is very prominent and mainly shows up from the pipe systems within the game. Always popping out at the wrong time and making you lose a mushroom of fire flower ability. Some of the iterations of the Pirahna plant can spit fireballs and even propel itself up and out of the tube straight up to attack the unsuspecting Mario brother. The Piranha Plant is fairly slow, but bulky and heavy hitting. Easy to use, and nice custom move sets.
characterQuotes: N/A

characterDescription: Ren Amiamiya (Joker) is the leader of vigilante group known as the Phantom Thieves. Joker is a user of the rare persona known as Wild Car, which allows him to use multiple personas at once. The character balance throughout the series makes him to be godly in most fights due to having the ability of Wild Card. HE mainly used the persona of Arsene, which refers to an amazingly talented thief named Arsene Lupin. Unbalanced character at the moment, but definitely fun to wipe the floor with others during battle.
characterQuotes: Yes. Before that happens we will take this country!(Persona 5)

characterDescription: Hero of Dragon Quest is a descendant of Erdick who has set out into the world to rid the kingdom of Alefgard from the dreaded tyranny of the Dragonlord. Just like other characters in the series, Hero is quiet and only answers questions very basically. After Hero leaves Alefgard, he ended up creating 3 kingdoms; Torland: Midenhall, Cannock, and Moonbrooke. Powerful character who vanquished his foes and pushed forth to better humanity with forms of safe havens. Hero is a solid character and always accompanies his allies into any situation.
characterQuotes: N/A
characterSong: The Hero Goes Forth with a Determination

characterDescription: Banjo & Kazooie are the main characters from the Banjo-Kazooie series which started in 1998 and was on the Nintendo 64. The main character Banjo the bear is a sweet and kindhearted honey-bear. He wears bright yellow shorts with a blue backpack and carries Kazooie around on their adventures. Both characters care a lot for their friends and risk their lives to save their friends. Although Banjo does not like adventuring, he managed to find quite a few adventures that became amazing stories. Kazooie is the opposite, she is sassy, wise cracking and bad mannered Breegull. She tends to get into conflicts and fights over some of the things she says aloud. The two working together are sure to help win the fight at hand.
characterQuotes: Why not, smart mouth?

characterDescription: Terry Bogard is the main character in the fatal fury series.  He is a well built and muscled character supposedly from America, although Fatal Fury takes place in Japan. Terry is known to be a very cheerful person and friendly to everyone around him. He bears no hatred towards anyone, other than Geese Howard who was the killer of his adoptive father Jeff Bogard or the Legendary Hungry Wolf. The initial game is one based on revenge for his fathers death and takes him to the King of Fighters Match to fight Geese and his henchmen. Terry defeated Geese in battle and was supposedly killed by the final blow. Great character with amazing pugilistic ability as well as martial arts ability. One formidable character for sure.
characterQuotes: Did you think you could beat me! Go home! (Fatal Fury), I won't lose until I avenge my father's death.(Fatal Fury), He was not much of a fighter despite his ugly face.(Fatal Fury)

characterDescription: Byleth is a main character and teacher at the officers academy in Fire Emblem: Three Houses, the most recent installment in the Fire Emblem franchise. Byleth is a quiet character but wise beyond his/her years. Byleth is a skilled tactician and powerful warrior on the battlefield. He/she quickly earns the respect of his/her peers through wit and skill in combat. Byleth after some time at the academy becomes intertwined in something much bigger than just the academy. He/she must decide the fates of those around him/her and and face the consequences of war in the decisions made. Byleth is only in Fire Emblem: Three Houses, which took on a play style like Fire Emblem Fates, where the player can choose one of 3 storylines to play through which makes for hours of exploration and strategy. Pick a class and get started today!
characterQuotes: There is still more to learn., A new path to tread. (Three Houses)
characterSong: Fire Emblem: Three Houses Main Theme
